mapper.select: select g.goods_id, g.goods_no, g.goods_name, gt.goods_type_name as goods_typeid, g.goods_sizes, g.goods_colors, g.goods_pic from wms_goods g, wms_goods_type gt where g.goods_typeid = gt.goods_type_id

select g.goods_id, g.goods_no, g.goods_name, gt.goods_type_name as goods_typeid, g.goods_sizes, g.goods_colors, g.goods_pic from wms_goods g, wms_goods_type gt where g.goods_typeid = gt.goods_type_id and g.goods_id = #{id}

select g.goods_id, g.goods_no, g.goods_name, gt.goods_type_name as goods_typeid, g.goods_sizes, g.goods_colors, g.goods_pic from wms_goods g, wms_goods_type gt where g.goods_typeid = gt.goods_type_id and g.goods_no = #{no}
select g.goods_id from wms_goods g where g.goods_no = #{no}

select g.goods_id, g.goods_no, g.goods_name, gt.goods_type_name as goods_typeid, g.goods_sizes, g.goods_colors, g.goods_pic from wms_goods g, wms_goods_type gt where g.goods_typeid = gt.goods_type_id and g.goods_name = #{goodsName}

select g.goods_id, g.goods_no, g.goods_name, gt.goods_type_name as goods_typeid, g.goods_sizes, g.goods_colors, g.goods_pic from wms_goods g, wms_goods_type gt where g.goods_typeid = gt.goods_type_id and g.goods_name like concat(concat('%',#{goodsName}),'%')
